thread.title: Digital hd tv channels not working, bbc itv channel 4
thread.title_full: Digital hd tv channels not working, bbc itv channel 4

author: andyrhi
title: Digital hd tv channels not working, bbc itv channel 4
text:
For help with your TalkTalk TV box, channels and apps.
an hour ago
Hi
For about 3 weeks our bbc, itv and channel 4 hd channels have lost signal through our talktalk tv box. I originally put this down to the weather but it has continued.
This happened about 2 or 3 years ago and was fixed by talktalk sending a replacement box.
Is there a way to test the current tv box we have?
Pretty sure that the aerial isn't to blame, exactly as last time.
Thanks
Andy
an hour ago
Hi
Connect the aerial directly to the TV when the signal is weak and see if the picture breaks up rtc, this will give an indication if there is a weak signal from the transmitter.
Thanks
Karl.
